mainTitle: Creating your clothes has never been easier
mainSubTitle: At Tailor Wings, YOU are the center of the story! Every garments will be custom-made just for you. So you can get everything personalized with the colours and sizes you want for an affordable price.
companyName: TAILOR WINGS COMPANY LIMITED / Tax code: 0316695125
minImageRequirement: Clear images will help the best sewing product.

requirement.title: What do you want to create?
requirement.description: Please send us at least 2 clear pictures of the design you want. Pictures will be used as a reference to create products for you.

fabric.title: Choose a fabric for your order
fabric.typeSubTitle: Here you can find all of our available fabrics (more will be added by time).

measurement.title: Your measurement
measurement.subTitle: We recommend you provide measurements to get the best fit for your clothes.

measureOnline.title: Measure Online
measureOnline.subTitle: Just follow these simple steps it just takes a few minutes.

standardSize.title: Standard Size
standardSize.subTitle: Choose your known standard size below.

measurement.pleaseSelectSize: Please select standard size that fit you!

summary.title: Personalizing Your Clothes
summary.subTitle: This is an important step. The product will be made exactly what you requested at this step. Detailed and clear requirements will help tailors meet your wishes best.
summary.description: Almost done!!! Your idea is awesome and our Tailor cannot wait to tailor it right away for you.

placeholder.note1: Ex: I want the neck 5cm deeper in comparison to the model ...
placeholder.note2: Ex: I want a comfortable fit, but not too loose
placeholder.note3: Ex: My arm is quite big, I want to hide it
placeholder.note4: Ex: Let's stitch a margin as big as possible just incase my body become bigger

orderConfirmDialog.title: Thank you for your information
orderConfirmDialog.description1: Next step you will be to check the
orderConfirmDialog.description3: page to pick a best tailor for you.
orderConfirmDialog.errorPhoneNumber: Please provide your valid phone number!

account.orderDetailNote: We will email or message you as soon as possible when our tailor offers the price for your order. It often takes 30 minutes on working hours.
account.name: Name

canTakeMeasurementsYourself: Can't take measurements yourself? We will help you!
chestDescription: Measure around the part under your armpits and upper your bust
bustDescription: Measure around the fullest part of the bust
waistDescription: Measure around the smallest part of the waist. Normally, the waistline will be at the same level as the elbow
highHipsDescription: Measure around the part of 7-9 cm(usually ) below your umbilical
hipsDescription: Measure the fullest part ( normally is biggest part) on your hips
bustDepthDescription: Measure from the base of the neck down to the nipple
frontShoulderToWaistDescription: Measure from the base of the neck pass by nipple and down to the waist
napeToWaistDescription: Measure from the central base of the neck down to the waist
waistToFloorDescription: Measure from the waist line down to floor
waistToHipsDescription: Measure from the waist line down to the hips line
shoulderDescription: Measure across the back from the corner of one shoulder to the corner of the other shoulder
armLengthDescription: With one arm down, start from the corner of the shoulder and measure down to where you'd like the dress hem to end
armHoleDescription: Measure full circle of your armhole. It should be fit, not too tired or too loose
neckSizeDescription: Measure around the base of the neck
pantsSkirtWaistDescription: Measure around the part of Pants/Skirt waist that you want to wear
pantsSkirtLengthDescription: Measure from the Pants/Skirt waist down to where you would like for the hem
dressShirtLengthDescription: Measure from the base of the neck pass by nipple and down to where you would like for the dress/shirt hem
dressShirtNeckDepthDescription: Measure how depth of the neck you want
dressShirtNeckWidthDescription: Measure how width of the neck you want
sleeveLengthDescription: Measure the part from the corner of the shoulder and down to where you want for the hem
